data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Fu, Yue, Saether, Ole A., Wang, Xinhua (2012): A review of Paratrichocladius Santos Abreu from the Sino-Indian Region (Diptera: Chironomidae: Orthocladiinae). Zootaxa 3478: 453-482, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209364
